14.6. Recurrent Neural Network Models 270
Âˆ ConvLSTM: A combination of CNNs and LSTMs where the LSTM units read input
data using the convolutional process of a CNN.
14.6.1 LSTM
The LSTM neural network can be used for univariate time series forecasting. As an RNN, it
will read each time step of an input sequence one step at a time. The LSTM has an internal
memory allowing it to accumulate internal state as it reads across the steps of a given input
